sign_in_to_continue: Sign in to continue to SfinX
create_account_desc: Create an account to get started
enter_login_info: Enter your login information to access your account
verification_successful_desc: Your email has been successfully verified.
verification_failed_desc: The verification link is invalid or has expired.
forgot_password_description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
forgot_password_email_sent: Reset link sent to your email.
invalid_reset_link_desc: This password reset link is invalid or has expired.
password_requirements: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
